text: Sedition Act may refer to: *Alien and Sedition Acts, including the Sedition Act of 1798, laws passed by the United States Congress *Sedition Act 1661, an English statute that largely relates to treason *Sedition Act of 1918, also passed by the United States Congress *Sedition Act 1948, a law in Malaysia *Sedition Act (Singapore), a law in Singapore ==See also== * List of short titles
title: Sedition Act
